Contents of text block. Supports markdow: I am an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Data Scientist with a deep passion for mathematics. As a postdoctoral fellow at Lund University, I apply data mining and AI-based frameworks to structured and unstructured health datasets, with a focus on epidemiology, public health, and systems medicine. I have over four years of experience in genetic epidemiology, data science, and machine learning, and I hold a PhD and a master's degree in medical sciences and public health, respectively.
